targets.expr: scalar(kube_resourcequota{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", type="hard",resource="requests.cpu",environment=~"$env"})
scalar(kube_resourcequota{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", type="hard",resource="limits.cpu",environment=~"$env"})
count(mixin_pod_workload{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", workload_type="$type",environment=~"$env"}) by (workload, workload_type)
scalar(kube_resourcequota{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", type="hard",resource="requests.memory",environment=~"$env"})
scalar(kube_resourcequota{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", type="hard",resource="limits.memory",environment=~"$env"})
count(mixin_pod_workload{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", workload_type="$type",environment=~"$env"}) by (workload, workload_type)

(sum(irate(container_network_receive_bytes_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace",environment=~"$env"}[$__interval])
* on (namespace,pod)
group_left(workload,workload_type) mixin_pod_workload{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", workload_type="$type",environment=~"$env"}) by (workload))

(sum(irate(container_network_transmit_bytes_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace",environment=~"$env"}[$__interval])
* on (namespace,pod)
group_left(workload,workload_type) mixin_pod_workload{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", workload_type="$type",environment=~"$env"}) by (workload))

(sum(irate(container_network_receive_packets_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace",environment=~"$env"}[$__interval])
* on (namespace,pod)
group_left(workload,workload_type) mixin_pod_workload{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", workload_type="$type",environment=~"$env"}) by (workload))

(sum(irate(container_network_transmit_packets_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace",environment=~"$env"}[$__interval])
* on (namespace,pod)
group_left(workload,workload_type) mixin_pod_workload{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", workload_type="$type",environment=~"$env"}) by (workload))

(sum(irate(container_network_receive_packets_dropped_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace",environment=~"$env"}[$__interval])
* on (namespace,pod)
group_left(workload,workload_type) mixin_pod_workload{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", workload_type="$type",environment=~"$env"}) by (workload))

(sum(irate(container_network_transmit_packets_dropped_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace",environment=~"$env"}[$__interval])
* on (namespace,pod)
group_left(workload,workload_type) mixin_pod_workload{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", workload_type="$type",environment=~"$env"}) by (workload))

(sum(irate(container_network_receive_bytes_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace",environment=~"$env"}[$__interval])
* on (namespace,pod)
group_left(workload,workload_type) mixin_pod_workload{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", workload=~".+", workload_type="$type",environment=~"$env"}) by (workload))

(sum(irate(container_network_transmit_bytes_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace",environment=~"$env"}[$__interval])
* on (namespace,pod)
group_left(workload,workload_type) mixin_pod_workload{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", workload=~".+", workload_type="$type",environment=~"$env"}) by (workload))

(avg(irate(container_network_receive_bytes_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace",environment=~"$env"}[$__interval])
* on (namespace,pod)
group_left(workload,workload_type) mixin_pod_workload{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", workload=~".+", workload_type="$type",environment=~"$env"}) by (workload))

panels.title: Average Container Bandwidth by Workload: Received

targets.expr:
(avg(irate(container_network_transmit_bytes_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace",environment=~"$env"}[$__interval])
* on (namespace,pod)
group_left(workload,workload_type) mixin_pod_workload{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", workload=~".+", workload_type="$type",environment=~"$env"}) by (workload))

panels.title: Average Container Bandwidth by Workload: Transmitted

group_left(workload,workload_type) mixin_pod_workload{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", workload=~".+", workload_type="$type",environment=~"$env"}) by (workload))

* on (namespace,pod)
group_left(workload,workload_type) mixin_pod_workload{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", workload=~".+", workload_type="$type",environment=~"$env"}) by (workload))

(sum(irate(container_network_receive_packets_dropped_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace",environment=~"$env"}[$__interval])
* on (namespace,pod)
group_left(workload,workload_type) mixin_pod_workload{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", workload=~".+", workload_type="$type",environment=~"$env"}) by (workload))

* on (namespace,pod) 
group_left(workload,workload_type) mixin_pod_workload{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", workload=~".+", workload_type="$type",environment=~"$env"}) by (workload))
